abstract: JPMorgan Chase announced on Tuesday that David Mayhew, a leading British banker, had stepped down as chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove, the bank’s subsidiary in London.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase announced on Tuesday that David Mayhew, a leading British banker, had stepped down as chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove, the bank’s subsidiary in London.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — David Mayhew, one of Britain’s most respected bankers, has stepped down as chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove, the company announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mayhew Steps Down as Chairman of J.P. Morgan Cazenove
